TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHasXmlNode

summary.span: 讓類別從目前的內容或位置傳回 。

span.span: Enables a class to return an from the current context or position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IHasXmlNode`介面提供的介面，可讓類別，以傳回從目前的內容或位置。The `IHasXmlNode` interface provides an interface that enables a class to return an from the current context or position. 它藉由操作具有類別的物件節點。It is implemented by objects that operate over classes that have nodes. 例如，如果`XPathNavigator`物件由，您可以使用方法以傳回`XmlNode`代表導覽器的目前位置。For example, if the `XPathNavigator` object is created by an , you can use the method to return the `XmlNode` representing the current position of the navigator. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`GetNode`方法來擷取和修改所選取的節點。The following example uses the `GetNode` method to retrieve and modify the selected node. [!code-cpp[IHasXmlNode.GetNode#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/IHasXmlNode.GetNode/CPP/hasxmlnode.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IHasXmlNode.GetNode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/IHasXmlNode.GetNode/CS/hasxmlnode.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IHasXmlNode.GetNode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/IHasXmlNode.GetNode/VB/hasxmlnode.vb#1)] 此範例會使用檔案`books.xml`做為輸入。The example uses the file `books.xml` as input. [!code-xml[IHasXmlNode.GetNode#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/IHasXmlNode.GetNode/XML/books.xml#2)]
